verbs.description: philippines races to [V: free] [ARG1: 30 trapped in landslide typhoon] kills 7 philippine rescue teams worked to free at least 30 people trapped under earth and rubble on wednesday after a typhoon dumped heavy rainfall on a mountainous region triggering floods and deadly landslides american family publishers ruben carandang u s martin petty china manila bay luzon engineer noel celis isabela philippines hawaii typhoon yutu cordillera afp mountain province
